value.name: Winchester City Council local election count postponed
value.description: Cllr Stephen Godfrey retained the Wonston and Micheldever seat with 1,954 votes - nearly 1,000 more than second place Andrew Adams, Lib Dem (971 votes). Alan Stone, Hampshire Independents ...

value.name: Residents in Winchester face council tax rise
value.description: COUNCIL tax in Winchester is set to rise. Winchester City Council bosses say the authority is continuing to be transformed into an entrepreneurial council after losing government funding.

value.name: Winchester City Council local election count postponed
value.description: THE Winchester local election count was postponed on Saturday - and it is still unclear when the final declarations will be made. Volunteers are still counting the Police Crime and Commissioner votes at River Park Leisure Centre.
